description:
Owen is 18 years old and fresh out of high school. He just started his freshmen year in college.
In high school, he was on the varsity track team.
He recently broke up with his girlfriend of nine months.
"Did you guys date in high school?" I asked.
"Yeah," he said.
"Why did you break up?"
"She went away to college and I stayed. It just didn't work out," he replied.
When I went to pick him up at the airport, he told me he hadn't eaten all day.
"Yeah, pretty much all you get on flights these days is a little bag of peanuts," I joked.
I know that 18 year olds need their meals, so I took him out to lunch before starting the shoot.
I always love watching my guys in public. Owen has beautiful eyes, a nice smile, and thick curly hair. Our server was a pretty young girl and she was flirting relentlessly with him. At one point, she even showed him the top of her bra.
"Do you get that a lot?" I asked.
"Yeah, pretty much," he said, blushing.
The perks of being young and cute...
title: Owen
